## Site Information
- **Name**: Aviral Jain Portfolio
- **URL**: https://aviral.xyz
- **Description**: A comprehensive portfolio showcasing skills as a full stack developer, including work experience, projects, and technical blogs.
- **Owner**: Aviral Jain
- **Location**: Gurugram, Haryana, India

## About
Aviral Jain is a full-stack engineer from India who enjoys building user-friendly applications with solid backend design. The portfolio demonstrates capabilities in web development, showcasing impactful contributions from internships and professional roles.

## Technology Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js 16.0.7 (TypeScript)
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Animations**: Motion (v12.23.24)
- **CMS**: Hygraph + GraphQL
- **Analytics**: Vercel Analytics
- **Deployment**: Vercel (presumed)

## Site Structure

### Main Pages
1. **Home** (`/`)
   - Grid-based layout with interactive tiles
   - About section with introduction
   - Recent blog post preview
   - Recent project preview
   - Social media links
   - Spotify integration (currently playing track)
   - Contact information
   - Theme toggle functionality
   - Live clock and visitor location

2. **Work** (`/work`)
   - Work experience and professional history
   - Skills showcase
   - Internships and roles
   - Technical competencies

3. **Projects** (`/projects`)
   - Portfolio of key projects
   - Project descriptions and details
   - Technologies used in each project
   - Links to live demos and repositories

4. **Blogs** (`/blogs`)
   - Technical blog posts
   - Thoughts on technology and web development trends
   - Insights and tutorials

## Key Features
- Dark/light theme support
- Responsive grid layout
- Real-time Spotify integration
